title: One Bite
description: Find the best slice of pizza using the One Bite app from Barstool Sports. Starting as a video series, Dave “El Presidente” Portnoy has created a cult following of people giving “one bite” pizza reviews by the common man, for the common man. Now you can find all 600+ of Dave’s reviews complete with videos, scores and location. One Bite users can upload their own reviews at any of the 75,000+ restaurants available in the app.
